title: Seon

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- can multitask
- lost wolf: if a ref attacks them,they will instead be converted into whatever ref faction they are.Cannot be done multiple times, if multiple people attack, they die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose the game (you can win while dead)

desc:
Post 3899
Im clearly an outsider and not used to this style
Abilities:
- Target a player, if they die tonight or kill a player, that player's will is not revealed nor is it stated who killed them (role is still revealed)
- disable whispers  for a day , single use
- turn voting into plurality : the player with the most votes at the end of the day dies,irregardless of if they have majority or not; if they get majority they die instantly. single use
